match_overview.key_tactical_story: The Blue Team emerged victorious in a tightly contested match against the Striped Team, with both teams showcasing attacking intent. The Blue Team's ability to capitalize on key moments, particularly late in the game, proved to be the difference. The Striped Team struggled to convert chances despite generating numerous shots.

strengths: Set piece variety (multiple free kicks and corners)
black_and_white_team.shot_accuracy: Edinburgh United had 13+ shots but failed to score any goals. Multiple shots were saved by the opposition goalkeeper, went over the crossbar, or were blocked by defenders.

strengths: Clinical finishing (1 goal from limited opportunities)
blue_team.shot_accuracy: Cowdenbeath Central scored the decisive goal at 45:53 and maintained defensive solidity throughout the match, despite being under pressure from Edinburgh United's attacks.

key_moments.description: Edinburgh United awarded a penalty but the shot is saved by Cowdenbeath Central's goalkeeper.
key_moments.tactical_significance: A crucial missed opportunity for Edinburgh United to equalize. Highlights their finishing problems and the opposition goalkeeper's quality.

key_moments.description: Edinburgh United celebrates what appears to be a goal, but it's not confirmed in the final result.
key_moments.tactical_significance: Shows Edinburgh United's attacking pressure and ability to create chances, but also their inability to convert opportunities into confirmed goals.

black_and_white_team: Focus on finishing drills and shot accuracy training
Develop better shot selection (get closer to goal)
Practice converting set pieces more effectively
blue_team: Maintain defensive solidity and goalkeeping standards

training_priorities.description: Improve shot accuracy and decision-making in final third
Strengthen communication and positioning to prevent goals
Improve free kick and corner delivery accuracy
